https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gcaeUI6vHliLiOdrfS5NYrmp6en.jpg It's a classic case of opposite attraction: Handsome Ben Bennet is a gay, affluent, stylish attorney at the top of the genteel social set in southern Virginia, while Lee Darcy is a rough-hewn welder with a secret that he nightly tries to blot out with an excess of liquor. Before the Fall
